body:
After some failed attempts at coming up with a decent way to parametrize version checksums based on the target platform, the most straightforward solution seemed to just add an explicit platform suffix to each version and let Spack do its magic.

Please note that the previous version of this `package.py` makes Spack hang on requested user input when installing on an architecture other than `x86_64`.

Pinging @alalazo b/c of some previous discussion on this issue.
title: arm-forge: add all available versions
